CSS Classes / Actions / Display

  • CSS Classes
  • Actions
  • Display

Section 2

  • Section 1
  • Section 2
  • Section 3

CSS Classes

Add Class

Function for adding class to element:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('div').addClass('some-class');
Remove Class

Function for remove class from element:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('div').removeClass('some-class');
Toggle Class

Function for toggle class on element(work with events):

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('.g-btn').on('click', function () {               
    $('div').eq(2).toggleClass('active');
});

Actions

HTML

Function for adding content into tag:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('.some-class').html(`Hi, ${person.title}`);
EQ

Function for select number element from list elements:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('div').eq(2).toggleClass('active');
Index

Function for indicate number of element in parent scope:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
console.log($('.some-class').index());
Find

Function for display all elements in collection:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('div').find('.more');
Closest

Function for find parent element:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('.some').closest('.finddiv');
Siblings

Function for find all siblings of element:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('.more').eq(0).siblings().addClass('testclass')

Display

HTML

Function for adding content into tag:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('.some-class').html(`Hi, ${person.title}`);
EQ

Function for select number element from list elements:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
$('div').eq(2).toggleClass('active');
Index

Function for indicate number of element in parent scope:

Copy to clipboard 
                                
console.log($('.some-class').index());
